The A'erbasi No. 2 Well Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the industrial park of Qipanjing Town, Etokqi, Inner Mongolia

owners: Inner Mongolia Ordos Investment Holding Company
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Inner Mongolia Ordos Coal Company, which is fully owned by Inner Mongolia Ordos Investment Holding Company.
